channel.title: iPlayRS - (637/639) iPlayOG Network
channel.description:
Welcome to iPlayRS!
We are a new server in development as of right now. We are constantly updating our server in order to fulfill the likes of our players! Our server is a new addition to the iPlayOG Network where our popular Gunz the Duel server: Dark GunZ is located, we also have our very own Minecraft server!
Here's a perm link for the launcher download (if the website is under maintenance) : [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/68097510/RSLauncher.exe]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/68097510/RSLauncher.exe[/url]
You can visit the forum at [url=http://www.iplayogforums.com]www.iplayogforums.com[/url]
Register on the forum and then register an In-game account after you download our client. The forum is well known for its community, feel free to join and introduce yourself!
After registering an in-game account, be sure to set your recovery question and your e-mail for extra account security at [url=http://www.iplayrs.com/cp/index.php]Welcome to Project Aerial[/url] and log-in with the credentials you used to log-in in game!
To DOWNLOAD iPlayRS please visit: [url=http://forum.iplayog.com/showthread.php?36142-Welcome-to-iPlayRS!-About-the-Server-starting-up-tips-and-more!&p=273818#post273818]Welcome to iPlayRS! : About the Server, starting up tips, and more![/url]
PLEASE read our rules carefully, this will ensure that you don’t receive a ban or a mute. Staff Team Owner – Logan Lead Administrator: Professional Moderator – Kody Moderator - AAA Mods
We are not looking for any staff members as of now, but when applications are open, you will know by looking on the forum!
Our server includes the following:
A unique 637/639 Base [IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/jc1142004/My Pictures/start.jpg[/img]
Our unique Auto-Updating Launcher [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2v1t7qf.jpg[/img]
New Client coming soon!
New Minigames,Shops,Commands, and Monsters coming soon!
Working summoning, with specs and all of that good stuff! [IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/jc1142004/My Pictures/Summoning.jpg[/img]
Full Prayer capability! [IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/jc1142004/My Pictures/expaltar.jpg[/img]
Acceptable EXP Rates and a Stable Economy!
Insane bosses, including the Almighty Demon NEX! [IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/jc1142004/My Pictures/Nex.jpg[/img]
A FULL WORKING CONTROL PANEL, which will allow you to check messages, change recoveries, set user titles etc. [IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/jc1142004/My Pictures/CP.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/jc1142004/My Pictures/cpoptions.jpg[/img] Premium Membership which allows access to classified shortcuts, skilling areas, various bank areas, donor status on our forum, user titles in-game, and best of all..IT’S CHEAP!
Full barrows, make sure you don’t forget your spade! [IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/jc1142004/My Pictures/barrows.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/jc1142004/My Pictures/bros.jpg[/img] Working God Wars Bosses! [IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/jc1142004/My Pictures/Gods.jpg[/img] Full Crafting as well as other skills! [IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/jc1142004/My Pictures/Capture.jpg[/img] General store located at the spawn area on the docks! [IMG]http://i59.photobucket.com/albums/g320/jc1142004/My Pictures/Genstore.jpg[/img]
And plenty more to come! Don't miss out on your chance to join this wonderful new server with a GREAT community!
A quote from the owner, "Hosted on a 16gb i7 huge dedicated server absolutely no lag, no downtime server sided, tons of mini-games, including but not limited to castle wars, clan wars safe and dangerous, so many skills so much content.
With over 13,500 registered members of our community the fun will never stop, and we don't just own a massive RSPS but 2 other games also! Check out the server, don't enjoy it? Move on to the next game in our professionally programmed community all made and continually updated for the enjoyment of our players. Just to touch up on a few things, NEW CONTENT ADDED WEEKLY, and bugs are worked on within 24-48 hours of being reported. Want to be a member but not sure of the benfits? Ask / private message an admin to recieve 5 FREE membership days for a limited time for very select players.
We own the only web mangement console of its kind. The lobby is 100% functional with membership days showing, along with your email and recoveries set or not. Clan chat works 100%. Need anything, just ask!
Feel free to pm me with any questions, comments or concerns. Regards, Logan. iPlayRS Lead developer and owner."

item.title: iPlayRS - (637/639) iPlayOG Network
item.dc:creator: @AAA_Mods AAA Mods
item.description:
@AAA_Mods wrote:

@AAA Thanks for replying to my PM. I just had to ask Logan myself -_-
[/quote]

Sorry

I’m at work, and I wasn’t constantly checking!

Read full topic

item.title: iPlayRS - (637/639) iPlayOG Network
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Drcodyjones:

Anti Virus caught it as a virus.

wat r u tlkin bout

2qv4g37.png800×560

@AAA Thanks for replying to my PM. I just had to ask Logan myself -_-

Read full topic

item.title: iPlayRS - (637/639) iPlayOG Network
item.dc:creator: @AAA_Mods AAA Mods
item.description:
@AAA_Mods wrote:

Drcodyjones:

Anti Virus caught it as a virus.

There’s no virus in the launcher, all it does is check a server, and download files. It might come up as suspicious because of that?

Read full topic

@AAA_Mods wrote:

Welcome to iPlayRS!

We are a new server in development as of right now. We are constantly updating our server in order to fulfill the likes of our players! Our server is a new addition to the iPlayOG Network where our popular Gunz the Duel server: Dark GunZ is located, we also have our very own Minecraft server!

Here’s a perm link for the launcher download (if the website is under maintenance) :

Register on the forum and then register an In-game account after you download our client. The forum is well known for its community, feel free to join and introduce yourself!

And plenty more to come! Don’t miss out on your chance to join this wonderful new server with a GREAT community!

A quote from the owner, "Hosted on a 16gb i7 huge dedicated server absolutely no lag, no downtime server sided, tons of mini-games, including but not limited to castle wars, clan wars safe and dangerous, so many skills so much content.

With over 13,500 registered members of our community the fun will never stop, and we don’t just own a massive RSPS but 2 other games also! Check out the server, don’t enjoy it? Just to touch up on a few things, NEW CONTENT ADDED WEEKLY, and bugs are worked on within 24-48 hours of being reported. Want to be a member but not sure of the benfits? We own the only web mangement console of its kind. The lobby is 100% functional with membership days showing, along with your email and recoveries set or not. Clan chat works 100%. Need anything, just ask!

Feel free to pm me with any questions, comments or concerns.
